channel.title: CVE Feed for Esri -- ArcGIS Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Esri -- ArcGIS Server

item.title: CVE-2021-29105|2024-09-17T01:00:39.520Z -- esri -- arcgis%20server
item.description: A stored Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Esri ArcGIS Server Services Directory version 10.8.1 and below may allow a remote authenticated attacker to pass and store malicious strings in the ArcGIS Services Directory.
